Comedy creators and performers are taking part in a conference to help emerging writers this weekend.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The fourth Craft of Comedy Writing Conference is taking place at Venue Cymru, Llandudno, for anyone who thinks they could work in comedy.
Speakers include actress Sian Gibson, Radio Four commissioning editor Sioned Wiliam and Ged Parsons who writes for BBC One's Have I Got News For You.
There will be question and answer sessions and tips on working in comedy.
